00001 /*
00002         Drawing related static class.
00003         This provides access to the game's Surfaces, color value conversion
00004         and text aligning helpers.
00005 */
00006 
00007 #ifndef DRAWING_H
00008 #define DRAWING_H
00009 
00010 #include <GeneralDefinitions.h>
00011 #include <Surface.h>
00012 
00013 class Drawing
00014 {
00015 public:
00016         //TextBox dimensions for tooltip-style boxes
00017         static RectangleStruct GetTextBox(const wchar_t* pText, int nX, int nY, int nMargin)
00018                 {
00019                         RectangleStruct box;
00020                         RectangleStruct* p_box=&box;
00021 
00022                         int ymarg=nMargin+2;
00023                         PUSH_IMM(nMargin);              //X Margin
00024                         PUSH_IMM(ymarg);                //Y Margin - should add 2, because X margin adds to 2 internally!
00025                         PUSH_IMM(0);                    //X Offset
00026                         PUSH_VAR32(nY);
00027                         PUSH_VAR32(nX);
00028                         SET_REG32(edx,pText);
00029                         SET_REG32(ecx,p_box);
00030                         CALL(0x4A59E0);
00031 
00032                         return box;
00033                 }
00034 
00035         static RectangleStruct GetTextBox(const wchar_t* pText, int nX, int nY)
00036                 { return GetTextBox(pText, nX, nY, 2); }
00037 
00038         static RectangleStruct GetTextBox(const wchar_t* pText, Point2D* pPoint)
00039                 { return GetTextBox(pText, pPoint->X, pPoint->Y, 2); }
00040 
00041         static RectangleStruct GetTextBox(const wchar_t* pText, Point2D* pPoint, int nMargin)
00042                 { return GetTextBox(pText, pPoint->X, pPoint->Y, nMargin); }
00043 
00044         //TextDimensions for text aligning
00045         static RectangleStruct GetTextDimensions(const wchar_t* pText)
00046                 {
00047                         RectangleStruct dim=GetTextBox(pText,0,0,0);
00048 
00049                         dim.X=0;
00050                         dim.Y=0;
00051                         dim.Width-=4;
00052                         dim.Height-=2;
00053 
00054                         return dim;
00055                 }
00056 
00057         //Stuff
00058 
00059         // RGB
00060         static WORD Color16bit(ColorStruct* pColor)     //Converts an RGB color to a 16bit color value.
00061                 { return (pColor->B >> 3) | ((pColor->G >> 2) << 5) | ((pColor->R >> 3) << 11); }
00062 
00063         static ColorStruct WordColor(WORD bits)
00064                 {
00065                         ColorStruct color;
00066                         color.R = ((bits & 0xF800) >> 11) << 3;
00067                         color.G = (BYTE)((bits & 0x07E0) >> 5) << 2; // msvc stupid warning
00068                         color.B = (bits & 0x001F) << 3;
00069                         return color;
00070                 }
00071 };
00072 
00073 //A few preset 16bit colors.
00074 #define         COLOR_BLACK             0x0000
00075 #define         COLOR_WHITE             0xFFFF
00076 
00077 #define         COLOR_RED               0xF800
00078 #define         COLOR_GREEN             0x07E0
00079 #define         COLOR_BLUE              0x001F
